definition: arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy
91 BC attempted coup d'etat against Emperor Wu of Han 漢武帝|汉武帝, beginning with accusations of witchcraft
to damage the people and harm the country (idiom)
to curse sb/to place a jinx

sentences.english: Who know one day this'love center Gu'will can't lose effect.
sentences.chinese: 誰知道有一天這‘嗜心蠱’會不會失效。

sentences.english: He denied witch craft, he was denied of magic and that kind of thing.
sentences.chinese: 拒絕巫蠱和魔法之類的東西。

sentences.english: I must finish this letter before I go home.
sentences.chinese: 我必須在回家以前寫完這封信譁乏糕何蕹蠱革坍宮開。

sentences.english: Children will pin pictures of fish to a friends back in jest.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們把畫了魚的紙貼在朋友背後來整蠱他們。

sentences.english: Coz it's voodoo, voodoo, voodoo, under your spell.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是巫術，是蠱，是毒，中了你的魔咒。

sentences.english: Would you like to have your friends in for a few drinks.
sentences.chinese: 你願意邀請你的朋友們來喝幾蠱嗎？

definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to slander/to defame/to speak ill of
see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
